attributes.action: Bring Tesco meal deals back down to £3
attributes.additional_details: The Tesco meal deal was famed for its £3 price point which was a saviour to many students and the general public, however with the prices rallying up to £3.50 (£3 with a Clubcard) and now £3.90 (£3.40) with a Clubcard) we can no longer stand and hold our peace as the economy crumbles before our faces. Many of us are already facing the question of heat or eat, don’t take them both away from us
attributes.background: We demand that the government caps the price of Tesco meal deals at no more than £3 to ensure people can still enjoy a meal deal without paying more than they should in this cost of living crisis

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about pricing in retail outlets are a matter for retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
